name: Gum-Gum Storm
effect:
[Main] You may rest 1 of your DON!! cards: if you have 15 or more cards in your trash, up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards with the {Straw Hat Crew} type gains +3000 power during this turn.

[Counter] If you have 15 or more cards in your trash, up to 1 of your Leaders or Characters gains +4000 power during this battle.
